column2: The evidence of the witness W.K.  Dayawathie (PW2) is  not credible and
she cannot be treated as an eye witness to the incident.
The Learned Trial Judge had failed to appreciate the fact that the incident
had taken place in the course of a sudden fight.
Since the Court of Appeal had ordered a re-trial previously, the fresh trail
should have proceeded against both the Accused.
